112.content: Where does this take place?

1122.content:
your name is jack harrison , you're 18 and being the eldest son you always bullied your little brother zeke ( 10) , you always bullied him for alot of things sometimes you bully him because of how short he is (5'5') compared to you (5'11") sometimes you would bully him because of how skinny he is .
the day starts with you waking up realizing your parents left for the weekend and you couldn't be happier because you will be in charge
how do you start your day ?
1122.title: Home

1123.content: Do you wanna babysit someone?
1123.title: Babysitting?

11231.content: Are you babysitting a girl, a boy, or both?
11231.title: Sure

112312.content: You will be taking care of 10 year old Derek. Is this ok?
112312.title: A boy

112313.content: You are babysitting 8 year old boy and a 6 year old girl. Are you fine with that?
112313.title: Both

113.content: Where does this take place?
113.title: Where?

1133.content: Your parents were going away for the week and wanted you to watch your younger sibling while they were gone. Thinking it would be a cake walk you agree and head over to their house at the requested time. As you knock on the door it is answered not by your parents but by you little.
1133.title: Babysitting your younger sibling

choices: he grabs the waistband of your underwear and wedgies you
makes a bet on the winner of the game, than trounces you
11331.content:
"Hey bud," you said ruffling your little brother's hair as you step through the door accidentally hitting him in the face with your luggage bag. Your parents had waited a long time between your birth and your little brother so that while you were twenty-eight year old he was only six. Dropping your bag by the door you go talk to your parents wishing them good luck on their trip. As you did so your little brother had begun to look through your bag in the hopes of discovering so toy or something. Finding nothing and being upset that you had not apologized for smacking him with your bag he decided to pull a prank on you as soon as your parents left.

Half a hour later you and your little brother wave goodby as your mom drives away with your dad navigating. "So bud what should we do first?" you asked him.

"Lets play some video games," your little brother said all smiles. You shrug and start up a two person head to head game getting rather into it as you bend down as you concentrate on trying to win. You are so focused you in the game yo do not realize your brother was not giving it his all that is until....
11331.title: brother

113312.content:
your little brother loved video games and had become very good at playing the games that he has, so when you heard him saying to you " okay big brother, how about we bet on the game, the winner gets to pick what the loser does for the time they are together.."

"Your on little brother " as they begin the battle, you were thinking that your little brother just made a huge mistake and that this was going to be easy, but your little brother was so good at this game that he was already thinking ' what will I have big brother do to me first … I could have him suck my toes or I could have him give me a bath or even make him prance around in any of moms clothes that I wish …"

As soon as the game began, you were kicking his butt, but then after little brother got done thinking about what he would have you do, he attacked your character so fast that you never even knew what hit you and soon your character was extinguished, as your little brother started jumping up and down yelling " I WIN... I WIN .."

your little brother quickly shuts off his game system and looks to you saying … " First I want you to __________"
113312.title: makes a bet on the winner of the game, than tro...

info.brief_description: Story of mean children turning up on you in various humiliating scenarios.
info.description:
You're not the toughest of them all and that's a light way to put it.
It's like a little girl or a boy could push you around and today is the day when they realize that.
While the name implies being beat up, the story may contain all sorts of humiliating and embarrassing scenarios.
Pretty much everything is allowed, except...

NO:
scat, hardcore gore, death, vomit nor actual sex.

Also, try to make everything fit the theme.
info.pretty_title: Beat up by a small kid
